body.raw:
# User Instructions

## Internet / WiFi

The internet WiFi can be accessed by:
* **Network**: SnowbirdQT
* **Password**: Namaste99

## Heating Guide

### Overview
- Snowbird sits in New Zealand's Southern Alps, where temperatures can swing dramatically (from 30Â°C+ to near freezing)
- The house features a heated concrete floor slab that maintains a comfortable preset temperature throughout
- Wall radiators are integrated into this whole-house heating system

### Temperature Management
- The heated floor maintains consistent warmth throughout the home
- Individual room radiators can be adjusted as needed
- System is designed to maintain comfort automatically
- Please notify us of any heating issues immediately

## Kitchen Appliances

### Gas Hobs
- Turn control knobs counter-clockwise to ignite
- Ensure proper flame before use
- Turn clockwise to off position when finished
- Gas shutoff valve located RHS of entrance stairwell, garage side

### Dishwasher
- Dishwasher tablets provided
- Load dishes properly to avoid damage
- Select appropriate cycle
- Ensure door seals properly

### Microwave & Oven
- Standard operation - instructions available in kitchen
- Preset temperatures and times recommended
- Clean after use
- Report any issues immediately

## Audio Visual

### Television & Entertainment
- Smart TV with streaming services available
- Instructions for operation provided near TV
- WiFi password: Namaste99
- Multiple viewing areas throughout home

### Sound System
- Integrated sound system throughout house
- Instructions for operation provided
- Keep volume respectful of neighbours

## Laundry / Drying Room

### Washing Machine
- Laundry powder provided
- Standard wash cycles available
- Clean lint filter after use
- Drying room available for hanging clothes

### Dryer
- Use appropriate settings for fabric type
- Clean lint filter before and after use
- Do not overload

## Children

### Child-Friendly Features
- High chairs available upon request
- Safety gates can be installed if needed
- Childproof latches on appropriate cabinets
- Outdoor areas are secure but require supervision

### Safety Notes
- Adult supervision required at all times
- Balconies and stairs require extra caution
- Hot surfaces and appliances - keep children away
- Pool/spa area requires constant adult supervision

## Miscellaneous

### Electric Blinds
- Automatic operation via wall controls
- Manual override available if needed
- Please close blinds in evening for privacy

### Windows & Ventilation
- All windows have security locks
- Fresh air circulation recommended
- Close windows during rain
- Report any sticking or issues

### Maintenance & Issues
- Report any problems immediately via booking platform
- Emergency contact information in Critical Information section
- Do not attempt repairs yourself
- Document any issues with photos if possible

### General Tips
- Familiarize yourself with all amenities upon arrival
- Instructions available throughout the home
- Contact us with any questions
- Enjoy your stay at this beautiful award-winning home!
